thread.section_title: The Wall Street Journal & Breaking News, Business, Financial and Economic News, World News and Video
thread.title: Broadcom Forces Qualcomm Into a Tough Choice

author: Dan Gallagher
title: Broadcom Forces Qualcomm Into a Tough Choice

organizations.name: broadcom forces qualcomm into a tough choice broadcom

text:
Broadcom just made it harder—though not impossible—for Qualcomm to say no.
Broadcom boosted its unsolicited offer for Qualcomm on Monday morning by 17% to $82 a share. That brings the deal’s total value to about $121 billion. Broadcom sweetened the bid by throwing in an additional $12 of its own shares, keeping the cash portion of the offer at $60 a share. Qualcomm responded that it will evaluate the bid, having formally turned down Broadcom’s first offer in early November about a week after it was made.
...
